title: Questions linger about future of TraCSS
summary:

title: Saab Explores Using ICEYE SAR Data for Command and Control Systems
summary:
Swedish defence giant Saab has signed a memorandum of understanding (MoU) with ICEYE to enhance its command and control systems using data from the company’s synthetic aperture radar satellites. Founded in 2014, ICEYE owns and operates the world’s largest constellation of synthetic aperture radar (SAR) satellites. With around 40 satellites in orbit, the company provides […]
The post Saab Explores Using ICEYE SAR Data for Command and Control Systems appeared first on European Spaceflight.
